snippet: Mutant worms generated at a lab at the University of Texas may provide a pathway to prevent people from becoming intoxicated after drinking alcohol, a study released on Wednesday said....

headline.print_headline: Halting Effects of Alcohol Linked to How the Worm Turns: Study
headline.main: Halting Effects of Alcohol Linked to How the Worm Turns: Study

lead_paragraph: Mutant worms generated at a lab at the University of Texas may provide a pathway to prevent people from becoming intoxicated after drinking alcohol, a study released on Wednesday said.
